label: applicableSustainabilityCharacteristic
comment: A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.

rangeIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

domainIncludes.comment: Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.
